subject: Teacher
bioTemplate: "Dear students, I'm pleased to introduce myself, {expertise} teacher {name}. I'm here to guide you through the world of numbers and equations. I have extensive experience teaching {expertise} and always strive to simplify complex concepts. I'm passionate about teaching and developing your skills, and I promise to do my best to help you deeply understand the subject and apply it in daily life. I'm here to support and guide you toward success."
